source.sqlReaderQuery:
SET LANGUAGE British;






SELECT Company_Name
      ,Company_Number
      ,Reg_Address_Care_Of
      ,Reg_Address_PO_Box
      ,Address_Line_1
      ,Address_Line_2
      ,Town
      ,County
      ,Country
      ,Postcode
      ,Company_Category
      ,Company_Status
      ,Country_of_Origin
    ,
	CASE
	WHEN LEN(Dissolution_Date)> 0
	THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(200),Dissolution_Date,103 ) 
         
	END Dissolution_Date

	 ,
	CASE
	WHEN LEN(Incorporation_Date)> 0
	THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(200),Incorporation_Date,103 ) 
         
	END Incorporation_Date


--  ,CASE
 --   WHEN ISDATE(Incorporation_Date) = 1
 --   THEN FORMAT(TRY_CONVERT(DATETIME, Incorporation_Date, 103), 'dd/MM/yyyy')
 --   ELSE NULL
--END AS Incorporation_Date    
      ,Account_Refday
      ,Account_Refmonth
      ,
	 CASE
	 WHEN LEN(Accounts_NextDueDate) > 0
	 THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Accounts_NextDueDate,103 ) 
    ELSE '01/01/1900'
	 END Accounts_NextDueDate
      ,
	  CASE
	 WHEN LEN(Accounts_LastMadeupDate) > 0
	 THEN  TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Accounts_LastMadeupDate,103 ) 
	 END Accounts_LastMadeupDate
      ,Acoounts_Category
      ,
	  CASE 
	  WHEN LEN(Returns_NextDueDate)>0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Returns_NextDueDate,103 )  
	  END Returns_NextDueDate
      ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(Returns_LastMadeUpDate) > 0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Returns_LastMadeUpDate,103 )  
	  END Returns_LastMadeUpDate
      ,Mortgage_Charges
      ,Mortgage_Outstanding
      ,Mortgage_Part_Satisifed
      ,SICCode_SicText_1
      ,SICCode_SicText_2
      ,SICCode_SicText_3
      ,SICCode_SicText_4
      ,LimitedPartnerships_NumGenPartners
      ,LimitedPartnerships_NumLimPartners
      ,URI AS URL
      ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_1_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_1_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_1_CONDATE
  
       ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_2_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_2_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_2_CONDATE
     

      ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_3_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_3_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_3_CONDATE

	    ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_4_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_4_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_4_CONDATE
    
	  ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_5_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_5_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_5_CONDATE

	    ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_6_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_6_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_6_CONDATE


	    ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_7_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_7_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_7_CONDATE
	
	    ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_8_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_8_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_8_CONDATE

	    ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_9_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_9_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_9_CONDATE

	    ,
	  CASE
	  WHEN LEN(PreviousName_10_CONDATE) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_10_CONDATE,103 )  
	  END PreviousName_10_CONDATE
	
	 ,PreviousName_1_CompanyName
	 ,PreviousName_2_CompanyName
	 ,PreviousName_3_CompanyName
     ,PreviousName_4_CompanyName
	 ,PreviousName_5_CompanyName
     ,PreviousName_6_CompanyName
     ,PreviousName_7_CompanyName
     ,PreviousName_8_CompanyName
     ,PreviousName_9_CompanyName
     ,PreviousName_10_CompanyName


	 ,CASE
	  WHEN LEN(ConfStmtNextDueDate) > 0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(max),ConfStmtNextDueDate,103 ) 
	  END ConfStmtNextDueDate
      
	  ,CASE
	  WHEN LEN(ConfStmtLastMadeUpDate) >0
	  THEN TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(max),ConfStmtLastMadeUpDate,103 ) 
	  END ConfStmtLastMadeUpDate
  FROM KNE_STG.Company_House

  Where company_number ='03826304'
